text:
Brian Christopher Deese (born February 17, 1978) is an American economic political advisor.
Deese was a senior advisor to U.S. President Barack Obama. He was the deputy director of the Office of Management and Budget and was the acting director of the office in the summer of 2014.
Deese also was deputy director of the National Economic Council.
In December 2020, Deese was chosen as the director of the National Economic Council by President-elect Joe Biden.
